Articles.Content:
Hi,

i playt this game quit a lot and now i begun to play it again and i installd some standard mods with CKAN. I Installled mechjeb 2, Space Y … but now everytime i hit the play button it crashd and i now that they mods are the same version like the game version. I tryd to bring it to work for a few hours but it didnt work and than i installd the mods manuel and i installd the mods step by step and still doesent work so i hope you can help me with that problem if you need some more crash reports just ask me.

 

Crashreport date: 2020-01-01_224152

 

 

your sincerly

melonencracer
Look for any files called MiniAVC.dll, if you find any, delete them.  They will be in the mod’s directories
